sentences.sContent: ...the Delaware River Port Authority, a major stakeholder in Penn's Landing.
sentences.sCn: …特拉华河港务局，佩恩码头的一个大股东。

phrases.pCn: n. 特定权益集团理论

trans.tranCn: 利益相关者；赌金保管者
trans.tranOther: someone chosen to hold the money that is risked by people on a race, competition etc and to give all of it to the winner
